data.message: What a wonderful idea, wish every town had one

replies.message: Hi Jane. It's truly inspiring what we can do together to help our community. Happy #GivingTuesday! -Rey

I think this is really lame and pretentious
  Why make up a phony  event.  For people who aren't doing it every day of the week already
  As many many

Unrecognized

Americans already do. It's like the greeting card companies making up Valentine's Day and Mother's Day    
  This is egoistic and self glorifying. Crap
its better to give then to receive, ever heard of that Stephen.Do it from the heart,God Bless

What Stephen seems to be saying, in my opinion, is these folks look to much like the manipulators who do "philanthropy" as a means to increase personal wealth and power, rather than to be helpful.  I understand feeling that kind of jadedness.  I always question the motives of once annually or special events.  Sometimes the motives are clearly good, sometimes clearly not, and other times hard to discern.
Well said Pop o Red !! Yes it's amazing how the power of a positive additude can make positive changes !!
